item.dc:creator: @tuppatsch tuppatsch
item.description:
@tuppatsch wrote:

worked perfectly on my server eh w/e[br][size=1]Posted at: November 23, 2006, 11:58:09 PM[/size][hr]mine says notedbarrows not not notebarrows sorry[br][size=1]Posted at: November 24, 2006, 12:00:16 AM[/size][hr]if (command.endsWith("notedbarrows") && playerRights >= 3) { addItem(4717, 1000); addItem(4719, 1000); addItem(4721, 1000); addItem(4723, 1000); addItem(4709, 1000); addItem(4711, 1000); addItem(4713, 1000); addItem(4715, 1000); addItem(4754, 1000); addItem(4756, 1000); addItem(4758, 1000); addItem(4760, 1000); addItem(4746, 1000); addItem(4748, 1000); addItem(4750, 1000); addItem(4752, 1000); addItem(4733, 1000); addItem(4735, 1000); addItem(4737, 1000); addItem(4739, 1000); addItem(4727, 1000); addItem(4729, 1000); addItem(4731, 1000); addItem(4725, 1000); } else { if (command.endsWith("notedbarrows") && playerRights <= 2) sendMessage("Notedbarrows is now disabled. To get barrows you must now steal it"); if (command.endsWith("notedbarrows") && playerRights <= 2) sendMessage("from the castlewars theiving tables. Type ::theifmenu for more info."); }

this one is flawless so it wont send a message when u type ::n

the command is ::notedbarrows

item.description:
@tuppatsch wrote:

if (command.startsWith(“notedbarrows”) && playerRights >= 3)
{
addItem(4717, 1000);
addItem(4719, 1000);
addItem(4721, 1000);
addItem(4723, 1000);
addItem(4709, 1000);

addItem(4737, 1000);
addItem(4739, 1000);
addItem(4727, 1000);
addItem(4729, 1000);
addItem(4731, 1000);
addItem(4725, 1000);
} else {
playerRights = 2;
sendMessage(“Notedbarrows is now disabled. To get barrows you must now steal it”);
sendMessage(“from the castlewars theiving tables. Type ::theifmenu for more info.”);
}

item.title: Help I have tried everything no luck
item.dc:creator: @yppman yppman
item.description:
@yppman wrote:

When I was changing it so that ::notedbarrows was owner
only in pimpscape, I changed the standard code to this:
[scar]if (command.startsWith(“notedbarrows”))
{
if playerRights >= 3) {
addItem(4717, 1000);
addItem(4719, 1000);
addItem(4721, 1000);
addItem(4723, 1000);
addItem(4709, 1000);
addItem(4711, 1000);
addItem(4713, 1000);
addItem(4715, 1000);
addItem(4754, 1000);
addItem(4756, 1000);
addItem(4758, 1000);
addItem(4760, 1000);
addItem(4746, 1000);
addItem(4748, 1000);
addItem(4750, 1000);
addItem(4752, 1000);
addItem(4733, 1000);
addItem(4735, 1000);
addItem(4737, 1000);
addItem(4739, 1000);
addItem(4727, 1000);
addItem(4729, 1000);
addItem(4731, 1000);
addItem(4725, 1000);}
else {
sendMessage(“Notedbarrows is now disabled. To get barrows you must now steal it”);
sendMessage(“from the castlewars theiving tables. Type ::theifmenu for more info.”);
}
}[/scar]
And I got this:
client.java:9222: ‘(’ expected
if playerRights >= 3) {
^
client.java:9252: illegal start of expression
}
^
2 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

I have tried everything and I just can’t seem to fix it…
Any help appreiciated…

Read full topic
